00033 
00034 // angular momentum of clusters restricted by JMAX
00035 // maximum number of SlaterDets per cluster CLMAX
00036 
00037 #define CLMAX 5
00038 
00039 
00040 typedef struct {
00041   SlaterDet* Qa;                
00042   int na;                       
00043   int Na;                       
00044   int *Ja;
00045   int *Ma;
00046   int *Pia;
00047   int npia;                     
00048   int nanga;
00049   double *alphaa, *betaa, *gammaa, *weighta;
00050   complex double (*wa)[CLMAX*(JMAX+1)];
00051   SlaterDet* Qb;                
00052   int nb;                       
00053   int Nb;
00054   int *Jb;
00055   int *Mb;
00056   int *Pib;
00057   int npib;
00058   int nangb;
00059   double *alphab, *betab, *gammab, *weightb;
00060   complex double (*wb)[CLMAX*(JMAX+1)];
00061 
00062   double d;                     
00063 } DiClusterMulticonfigInternals;
00064 
00065 
00066 MultiSlaterDet DiClusterMulticonfig = {
00067   A : 0,
00068   N : 0,
00069   n : 0,
00070   symmetry : DiClusterMulticonfigSymmetry,
00071   weight : DiClusterMulticonfigWeight,
00072   get : DiClusterMulticonfigGet,
00073   internals : NULL
00074 };
00075 
00076 
00077 // axial symmetry given by Ma+Mb 
00078 Symmetry DiClusterMulticonfigSymmetry(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int iM)
00079 {
00080   DiClusterMulticonfigInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00081   int iMa = iM % internals->Na;
00082   int iMb = iM / internals->Na;
00083 
00084   Symmetry S=0;
00085   setSymmetry(&S, axial0 + internals->Ma[iMa] + internals->Mb[iMb]);
00086 
00087   return S;
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 complex double DiClusterMulticonfigWeight(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int iM, int i)
00092 {
00093   DiClusterMulticonfigInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00094   int iMa = iM % internals->Na;
00095   int iMb = iM / internals->Na;
00096 
00097   int npia = internals->npia;
00098   int nanglespa = internals->nanga*npia;
00099 
00100   int npib = internals->npib;
00101   int nanglespb = internals->nangb*npib;
00102 
00103   int Ja, Ma, Pia;
00104   Ja = internals->Ja[iMa];
00105   Ma = internals->Ma[iMa];
00106   Pia = internals->Pia[iMa]; 
00107   
00108   int Jb, Mb, Pib;
00109   Jb = internals->Jb[iMb];
00110   Mb = internals->Mb[iMb];
00111   Pib = internals->Pib[iMb]; 
00112 
00113   int ia = i % (nanglespa*internals->na);
00114   int ib = i / (nanglespa*internals->na);
00115 
00116   int iangpa = ia % nanglespa;
00117   int iangpb = ib % nanglespb;
00118 
00119   double alphaa, betaa, gammaa, weighta;
00120   alphaa = internals->alphaa[iangpa/npia];
00121   betaa = internals->betaa[iangpa/npia];
00122   gammaa = internals->gammaa[iangpa/npia];
00123   weighta = internals->weighta[iangpa/npia];
00124   // fprintf(stderr, "i: %d, iangpa: %d, alphaa: %5.2f, betaa: %5.2f, gammaa: %5.2f\n",
00125   //     i, iangpa, alphaa, betaa, gammaa);
00126 
00127   double alphab, betab, gammab, weightb;
00128   alphab = internals->alphab[iangpb/npib];
00129   betab = internals->betab[iangpb/npib];
00130   gammab = internals->gammab[iangpb/npib];
00131   weightb = internals->weightb[iangpb/npib];
00132   //  fprintf(stderr, "i: %d, iangpb: %d, alphab: %5.2f, betab: %5.2f, gammab: %5.2f\n",
00133   //      i, iangpb, alphab, betab, gammab);
00134 
00135   complex double ca = 0.0;
00136   int Ka;
00137   for (Ka=-Ja; Ka<=Ja; Ka=Ka+2)
00138     ca += 1.0/npia* (npia==2 && Pia==-1 && ia%2 ? -1.0 : 1.0)* weighta* (Ja+1)/(8*M_PI*M_PI)* Djmkstar(Ja,Ma,Ka,alphaa,betaa,gammaa)*internals->wa[iMa][idxjm(Ja,Ka)+ia/nanglespa*(Ja+1)];
00139 
00140   complex double cb = 0.0;
00141   int Kb;
00142   for (Kb=-Jb; Kb<=Jb; Kb=Kb+2)
00143     cb += 1.0/npib* (npib==2 && Pib==-1 && ib%2 ? -1.0 : 1.0)* weightb* (Jb+1)/(8*M_PI*M_PI)* Djmkstar(Jb,Mb,Kb,alphab,betab,gammab)*internals->wb[iMb][idxjm(Jb,Kb)+ib/nanglespb*(Jb+1)];
00144 
00145   //fprintf(stderr, "Ja: %d, Ma: %d, ca: (%8.3f, %8.3f), Jb: %d, Mb: %d, cb: (%8.3f, %8.3f)\n",
00146   //        Ja, Ma, creal(ca), cimag(ca), Jb, Mb, creal(cb), cimag(cb));
00147 
00148   return ca*cb;
00149 
00150 }
00151 
00152 // workspace
00153 static SlaterDet *tmpQa, *tmpQb;
00154 
00155 static void joinintoSlaterDets(const SlaterDet* Qa, const SlaterDet* Qb, SlaterDet* Q)
00156 {
00157   assert(Q->A == Qa->A+Qb->A);
00158 
00159   Q->Z = Qa->Z+Qb->Z;
00160   Q->N = Qa->N+Qb->N;
00161   Q->ngauss = Qa->ngauss+Qb->ngauss;
00162 
00163   int i;
00164   // copy Qa
00165   for (i=0; i<Qa->A; i++) {
00166     Q->idx[i] = Qa->idx[i];
00167     Q->ng[i] = Qa->ng[i];
00168   }
00169   for (i=0; i<Qa->ngauss; i++)
00170     Q->G[i] = Qa->G[i];
00171 
00172   // copy Qb
00173   for (i=0; i<Qb->A; i++) {
00174     Q->idx[i+Qa->A] = Qb->idx[i]+Qa->ngauss;
00175     Q->ng[i+Qa->A] = Qb->ng[i];
00176   }
00177   for (i=0; i<Qb->ngauss; i++) 
00178     Q->G[i+Qa->ngauss] = Qb->G[i];
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 void DiClusterMulticonfigGet(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int i, SlaterDet* Q)
00183 {
00184   // initialize workspace
00185   if (!tmpQa) {
00186     tmpQa = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00187     tmpQb = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00188     allocateSlaterDet(tmpQa, MSD->A);
00189     allocateSlaterDet(tmpQb, MSD->A);
00190   }
00191 
00192   DiClusterMulticonfigInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00193 
00194   int npia = internals->npia;
00195   int nanglespa = internals->nanga*npia;
00196 
00197   int npib = internals->npib;
00198   int nanglespb = internals->nangb*npib;
00199 
00200   int ia = i % (nanglespa*internals->na);
00201   int ib = i / (nanglespa*internals->na);
00202 
00203   // fprintf(stderr, "get: i=%d, na=%d, nb=%d, nanglespa=%d, nanglespb=%d, ia=%d, ib=%d\n",     i, internals->na, internals->nb, nanglespa, nanglespb, ia, ib);
00204   
00205   double alphaa, betaa, gammaa;
00206   alphaa = internals->alphaa[(ia % nanglespa)/npia];
00207   betaa = internals->betaa[(ia % nanglespa)/npia];
00208   gammaa = internals->gammaa[(ia % nanglespa)/npia];
00209 
00210   double alphab, betab, gammab;
00211   alphab = internals->alphab[(ib % nanglespb)/npib];
00212   betab = internals->betab[(ib % nanglespb)/npib];
00213   gammab = internals->gammab[(ib % nanglespb)/npib];
00214 
00215   // fprintf(stderr, "tmpQa->A : %d\n", tmpQa->A);
00216   // fprintf(stderr, "Qa[%d].A : %d\n", ia/nanglespa, internals->Qa[ia/nanglespa].A);
00217   // fprintf(stderr, "tmpQb->A: %d\n", tmpQb->A);
00218   // fprintf(stderr, "Qb[%d].A : %d\n", ib/nanglespb, internals->Qb[ib/nanglespb].A);
00219   copySlaterDet(&internals->Qa[ia/nanglespa], tmpQa);
00220   copySlaterDet(&internals->Qb[ib/nanglespb], tmpQb);
00221 
00222   double massa = tmpQa->Z*mproton + tmpQa->N*mneutron;
00223   double massb = tmpQb->Z*mproton + tmpQb->N*mneutron;
00224   double mass = massa + massb;
00225 
00226   double xa[3] = {0,0,0};
00227   double xb[3] = {0,0,0};
00228 
00229   xa[2] = massb/mass* internals->d;
00230   xb[2] = -massa/mass* internals->d;
00231 
00232   rotateSlaterDet(tmpQa, alphaa, betaa, gammaa);
00233   if (npia==2 && ia%2)
00234     invertSlaterDet(tmpQa);
00235   moveSlaterDet(tmpQa, xa);
00236 
00237   rotateSlaterDet(tmpQb, alphab, betab, gammab);
00238   if (npib==2 && ib%2)
00239     invertSlaterDet(tmpQb);
00240   moveSlaterDet(tmpQb, xb);
00241 
00242   joinintoSlaterDets(tmpQa, tmpQb, Q);
00243 
00244 }

00247 static void sreadcvec(char* s, int n, complex double* a)
00248 {
00249   char *c;
00250   double ref, imf;
00251   int l;
00252 
00253   c = strtok(s, " ,()");
00254   for (l=0; l<n; l++) {
00255     ref=atof(c); c=strtok(NULL, " ,()");
00256     imf=atof(c); c=strtok(NULL, " ,()");
00257     a[l] = ref + I*imf;
00258   }
00259 }

00261 
00262 static int initangles(const char* projpar, int* nang,
00263                       double** alpha, double** beta, double** gamma, double** weight)
00264 {       
00265   char *c = projpar;
00266 
00267   c = strtok(c, "-");
00268 
00269   if (!strncmp(c, "none", 4)) {
00270     *nang = 1;
00271     *alpha  = malloc(sizeof(double));
00272     *beta   = malloc(sizeof(double));
00273     *gamma  = malloc(sizeof(double));
00274     *weight = malloc(sizeof(double));
00275     *alpha[0] = 0.0; *beta[0] = 0.0; *gamma[0] = 0.0; *weight[0] = 8*M_PI*M_PI;
00276     // weight is off by factor of 2J+1 !
00277   } else if (!strncmp(c, "zcw", 3)) {
00278     c=strtok(NULL, "-");
00279     int zcwidx = atoi(c);
00280     *nang = nangles3(zcwidx);
00281     *alpha  = malloc(*nang* sizeof(double));
00282     *beta   = malloc(*nang* sizeof(double));
00283     *gamma  = malloc(*nang* sizeof(double));
00284     *weight = malloc(*nang* sizeof(double));
00285     int i;
00286     for (i=0; i<*nang; i++) {
00287       getangles3(zcwidx, i, &(*alpha)[i], &(*beta)[i], &(*gamma)[i]);
00288       (*weight)[i] = (8*M_PI*M_PI)/(*nang);
00289     }
00290   } else {
00291     int reflectalpha=0;
00292     int reflectbeta=0;
00293     int reflectgamma=0;
00294 
00295     if (*c == 'r') {
00296       reflectalpha = 1;
00297       c++;
00298     }
00299     int nalpha = atoi(c);
00300 
00301     c=strtok(NULL, "-");
00302     if (*c == 'r') {
00303       reflectbeta = 1;
00304       c++;
00305     }
00306     int nbeta = atoi(c);
00307 
00308     c=strtok(NULL, "-");
00309     if (*c == 'r') {
00310       reflectgamma = 1;
00311       c++;
00312     }
00313     int ngamma = atoi(c);
00314 
00315     double aalpha[nalpha], walpha[nalpha];
00316     double acosb[2*nbeta], wcosb[2*nbeta];
00317     double agamma[ngamma], wgamma[ngamma];
00318 
00319     if (reflectalpha) 
00320       ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(nalpha, 0, M_PI, 0, aalpha, walpha);
00321     else
00322       ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(nalpha, 0, 2*M_PI, 0, aalpha, walpha);
00323  
00324     if (reflectbeta) 
00325       GaussLegendrePoints(2*nbeta, -1.0, 1.0, acosb, wcosb);
00326     else
00327       GaussLegendrePoints(nbeta, -1.0, 1.0, acosb, wcosb);
00328 
00329     if (reflectgamma) 
00330       ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(ngamma, 0, M_PI, 0, agamma, wgamma);
00331     else
00332       ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(ngamma, 0, 2*M_PI, 0, agamma, wgamma);
00333 
00334     *nang = nalpha*nbeta*ngamma;
00335     *alpha  = malloc(*nang* sizeof(double));
00336     *beta   = malloc(*nang* sizeof(double));
00337     *gamma  = malloc(*nang* sizeof(double));
00338     *weight = malloc(*nang* sizeof(double));
00339 
00340     int ia,ib,ig;
00341     for (ia=0; ia<nalpha; ia++)
00342       for (ib=0; ib<nbeta; ib++)
00343         for (ig=0; ig<ngamma; ig++) {
00344           (*alpha)[ia+ib*nalpha+ig*(nalpha*nbeta)] = aalpha[ia];
00345           (*gamma)[ia+ib*nalpha+ig*(nalpha*nbeta)] = agamma[ig];
00346           if (reflectbeta) {
00347             (*beta)[ia+ib*nalpha+ig*(nalpha*nbeta)] = acos(acosb[2*nbeta-ib-1]);
00348             (*weight)[ia+ib*nalpha+ig*(nalpha*nbeta)] = walpha[ia]*2*wcosb[2*nbeta-ib-1]*wgamma[ig];
00349           } else {
00350             (*beta)[ia+ib*nalpha+ig*(nalpha*nbeta)] = acos(acosb[nbeta-ib-1]);
00351             (*weight)[ia+ib*nalpha+ig*(nalpha*nbeta)] = walpha[ia]*wcosb[nbeta-ib-1]*wgamma[ig];
00352           }
00353         }
00354   }
00355 
00356   return 0;
00357 }

00361 #define BUFSIZE 4096
00362 int DiClusterMulticonfigRead(FILE* fp, MultiSlaterDet* MSD)
00363 {
00364   *MSD = DiClusterMulticonfig;
00365 
00366   DiClusterMulticonfigInternals* internals = 
00367     malloc(sizeof(DiClusterMulticonfigInternals));
00368 
00369   SlaterDet Qa, Qb;
00370   char fnamea[255], fnameb[255];
00371   char md5hasha[255], md5hashb[255];
00372 
00373   double d;
00374   int na, nb;
00375   char anga[15], angb[15];
00376   int npia, npib;
00377   int Na, Nb;
00378 
00379   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00380   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00381   sscanf(buf, "<DiClusterMulticonfig d=%lf na=%d anga=%s npia=%d Na=%d nb=%d angb=%s npib=%d Nb=%d>", 
00382          &d, &na, anga, &npia, &Na, &nb, angb, &npib, &Nb);
00383 
00384   internals->d = d;
00385   internals->na = na;
00386   internals->npia = npia;
00387   internals->Na = Na;
00388   internals->nb = nb;
00389   internals->npib = npib;
00390   internals->Nb = Nb;
00391 
00392   // decode angular projection parameters
00393 
00394   initangles(anga, &internals->nanga,
00395              &internals->alphaa, &internals->betaa, &internals->gammaa, &internals->weighta);
00396   initangles(angb, &internals->nangb,
00397              &internals->alphab, &internals->betab, &internals->gammab, &internals->weightb);
00398 
00399   {
00400     int i;
00401     fprintf(stderr, "Angles Cluster A:\n");
00402     for (i=0; i<internals->nanga; i++)
00403       fprintf(stderr, "(alpha, beta, gamma): weight = (%8.3f, %8.3f, %8.3f): %8.5f\n",
00404               internals->alphaa[i], internals->betaa[i], internals->gammaa[i],
00405               internals->weighta[i]);
00406     fprintf(stderr, "Angles Cluster B:\n");
00407     for (i=0; i<internals->nangb; i++)
00408       fprintf(stderr, "(alpha, beta, gamma): weight = (%8.3f, %8.3f, %8.3f): %8.5f\n",
00409               internals->alphab[i], internals->betab[i], internals->gammab[i],
00410               internals->weightb[i]);
00411   }
00412 
00413   // Slater dets for Cluster a
00414 
00415   internals->Qa = malloc(na*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00416 
00417   int ia;
00418   for (ia=0; ia<na; ia++) {
00419     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00420     sscanf(buf, "<Cluster %s %s>", fnamea, md5hasha); 
00421     if (strncmp(md5hasha, md5hash(fnamea), 32)) {
00422       fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00423       return -1;
00424     }
00425     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Qa, fnamea)) {
00426       fprintf(stderr, "... couldn't open %s for reading\n", fnamea);
00427       return -1;
00428     }
00429     cloneSlaterDet(&Qa, &internals->Qa[ia]);
00430   }
00431 
00432   internals->Ja = malloc(Na*sizeof(int));
00433   internals->Ma = malloc(Na*sizeof(int));
00434   internals->Pia = malloc(Na*sizeof(int));
00435   internals->wa = malloc(Na*CLMAX*(JMAX+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00436 
00437   int Ja;
00438   int Ma;
00439   int Pia;
00440   char ca[BUFSIZE];
00441 
00442   int Ia;
00443   for (Ia=0; Ia<Na; Ia++) {
00444     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00445     sscanf(buf, "<Projection %d %d %d %[() ,.0-9eE+-]>", &Ja, &Ma, &Pia, ca);
00446 
00447     // fprintf(stderr, "Ja: %d, Ma: %d, Pia: %d, coefficients: %s\n",
00448     //      Ja, Ma, Pia, ca);
00449 
00450     internals->Ja[Ia] = Ja;
00451     internals->Ma[Ia] = Ma;
00452     internals->Pia[Ia] = Pia;
00453     sreadcvec(ca, na*(Ja+1), internals->wa[Ia]);
00454   }
00455 
00456   // Slater dets for Cluster b
00457 
00458   internals->Qb = malloc(nb*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00459 
00460   int ib;
00461   for (ib=0; ib<nb; ib++) {
00462     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00463     sscanf(buf, "<Cluster %s %s>", fnameb, md5hashb); 
00464     if (strncmp(md5hashb, md5hash(fnameb), 32)) {
00465       fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00466       return -1;
00467     }
00468     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Qb, fnameb)) {
00469       fprintf(stderr, "... couldn't open %s for reading\n", fnameb);
00470       return -1;
00471     }
00472     cloneSlaterDet(&Qb, &internals->Qb[ib]);
00473   }
00474 
00475   internals->Jb = malloc(Nb*sizeof(int));
00476   internals->Mb = malloc(Nb*sizeof(int));
00477   internals->Pib = malloc(Nb*sizeof(int));
00478   internals->wb = malloc(Nb*CLMAX*(JMAX+1)*sizeof(complex double));
00479 
00480   int Jb;
00481   int Mb;
00482   int Pib;
00483   char cb[BUFSIZE];
00484 
00485   int Ib;
00486   for (Ib=0; Ib<Nb; Ib++) {
00487     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00488     sscanf(buf, "<Projection %d %d %d %[() ,.0-9eE+-]>", &Jb, &Mb, &Pib, cb);
00489 
00490     internals->Jb[Ib] = Jb;
00491     internals->Mb[Ib] = Mb;
00492     internals->Pib[Ib] = Pib;
00493     sreadcvec(cb, nb*(Jb+1), internals->wb[Ib]);
00494   }
00495 
00496   MSD->A = internals->Qa[0].A + internals->Qb[0].A;
00497   MSD->N = Na*Nb;
00498   MSD->n = na*npia*internals->nanga*nb*npib*internals->nangb;
00499   MSD->internals = internals;
00500 
00501   fprintf(stderr, "N: %d, n: %d\n", MSD->N, MSD->n);
00502 
00503   return 0;
00504 }
